definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: I’ve been in that situation lately.
sentences.chinese: 我不久前也曾身陷這樣的處境。

sentences.english: Chinese State Councilor Ma Kai has recently concluded his visit to the EU headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，馬凱國務委員成功訪問歐盟總部。

sentences.english: Not long ago she took Heather to a shrimp boil.
Not so long ago Japanese wives put up with any amount of infidelity and abuse.
sentences.chinese: 在不久前，日本的妻子們還忍受着各種背叛和虐待。

sentences.english: An old women found out a empty bottle which had ever been filled the best wine .
sentences.chinese: 一個老太婆找到一個不久前曾裝過最好陳酒的空酒瓶。

sentences.english: I went looking for recent usages of the word crass.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我查了查單詞crass一些新近的用法。

sentences.english: When I was in Berlin recently I ordered a cheese-less pizza.
sentences.chinese: 不久前我去了柏林，我點了份無奶酪的披薩。

sentences.english: Not long ago, I heard that the money leaves given by my brother has dead under her care.
sentences.chinese: 不久前才聽說她把哥哥給她的金錢葉給種死了。

sentences.english: Is it true, pray? for of course you must know, as you have beenin Devonshire so lately.
sentences.chinese: 你當然應該知道啦，因爲你不久前還呆在德文郡。

sentences.english: Some time ago she had slippers.
sentences.chinese: 不久前她還有一雙拖鞋可穿。

sentences.english: Are you talking about Assistant Foreign Minister Hu Zhengyue's visit to the DPRK lately?
sentences.chinese: 是不久前外交部部長助理胡正躍訪朝的活動嗎？

sentences.english: The major had retired some little time before, and lived at Upper Norwood.
sentences.chinese: 這位少校不久前已經退伍，住在上諾伍德。

sentences.english: The gales, that lately sighed along the grove.
sentences.chinese: 順着小樹林不久前大風嘆口氣。

sentences.english: Liu Shihui was violently assaulted by law enforcement agents shortly before he disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 劉士輝在消失不久前也曾被打執法人員暴力對待。

sentences.english: We put out a 30-second clip of this song not too long ago and kids are freaking out.
sentences.chinese: 我們不久前放了這首歌的30秒片段孩子們都愛瘋了。

definition: in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
late last year/the end of last year
the other day/a few days ago
